text.autoconfig.graytan.title: Graytan
text.autoconfig.graytan.option.time.@Too: Time in milliseconds after which yaw and pitch become -90. Specify -1 if you do not want to use this function.
Enter a place name so that you can use the /gtp {place name} command (WIP). You can only use [a-Z], [0-9], [ _ - ]. Otherwise, the place name will automatically change to another one.
Use F3 to find out your yaw. Usually yaw is indicated by the first value in the F3 direction (yaw, pitch).
Use F3 to find out your pitch. Usually pitch is indicated by the second value in the F3 direction (yaw, pitch)
